import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const AddReview = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [rating, setRating] = useState('Rating'); const [reviewText, setReviewText] = useState(''); return (
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" id="name" className='form-contol' placeholder='name' />
) } export default AddReview
